short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension finds the best modules on your account and creates an assembly for any ship

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many DarkOrbit game players often face the fact that they have a huge number of in-game items called modules, from which they have to select the best for each ship in order to understand how strong their account is.
This process can sometimes be very long and complicated, and sometimes even requiring some kind of notepad or excel spreadsheet, so as not to get confused and make mistakes in calculations.

Now all these difficulties are solved instantly, conveniently and automatically with the help of the DOModuleBuilds extension!

The extension is embedded on the page where you view account information, and by extracting a list of all modules, it automatically makes calculations of the best modules, forming an assembly for each ship from them.

The extension also has a bunch of functionality that allows you to:
- See which modules the expansion has selected for each ship
- Fine-tune the process of selecting the best modules
- It is convenient to customize the display of all assemblies for yourself and in order to share with someone else
- It is convenient to share information in 1 click in the form of a list of ships with their characteristics in the form of text or image.
